## RNG.integer() function

Seedable RNG returning an integer between 0 (included) and max (excluded).

**Signature:**

```typescript
function integer(max?: number, seed?: number): RNGFactory<number>;
```

## Remarks

This RNG is decent but not crypto-safe.
